definition: to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out
(onom.) giggling/breathing/tearing of paper, ripping of fabric etc
to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out
(onom.) giggling/breathing/tearing of paper, ripping of fabric etc

sentences.english: He snorted and then said, “They want to go up north.
sentences.chinese: 他呼哧呼哧喘着气，然后说，“他们想去北边。

sentences.english: Denise huffs and puffs, several steps behind Richard.
sentences.chinese: 丹妮丝呼哧呼哧喘着气落在理查德身后几步。

sentences.english: A barrel-organ was wheezing out an old tune.
sentences.chinese: 一架手摇风琴正在呼哧呼哧地奏着一首古老的曲子。

sentences.english: He chomped his way through two hot dogs.
sentences.chinese: 他呼哧呼哧地吃掉了两个热狗。
这架旧风琴呼哧呼哧地响。

sentences.english: John answered with the loudness of his breathing.
sentences.chinese: 乔用呼哧呼哧的喘气声来回答这个问题。

sentences.english: Frog went leaping over rock, and Toad came puffing up behind him.
sentences.chinese: 青蛙一蹦一跳地越过岩石，蟾蜍呼哧呼哧地跟在后面。

sentences.english: He whoofed into the hand mike experimentally before the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 会前他向话筒里呼哧呼哧地吹气试验音响效果。

sentences.english: The horse snorted and stamped its hoof impatiently.
sentences.chinese: 这匹马呼哧呼哧地喷着气，不耐烦地跺着蹄子。

sentences.english: The train wheezed wreaths of steam.
sentences.chinese: 火车呼哧呼哧的喷出一团团蒸汽。

definition: (onom.) sound of the wind or the breathing of sb who is sound asleep
out of breath (idiom)/to gasp for air
pinyin: shang4 qi4 bu4 jie1 xia4 qi4

definition: to breathe heavily like an ox (idiom)/to huff and puff
big mouthful (of food, drink, smoke etc)/open mouth/gulping/gobbling/gaping
sorption (generic term for absorption, adsorption, diffusion, precipitation etc)
